short_description: Call Payment API allows unauthorized access to sensitive data
title: Unauthorized Access to Sensitive Data in Call Payment API

OWASP_MASVS_L1: V2.1 MSTG-STORAGE-1: 'Verify that sensitive data is not stored in cleartext on the device.'
V2.1 MSTG-STORAGE-2: 'Verify that sensitive data is not stored in cleartext in shared preferences.'
V2.1 MSTG-STORAGE-3: 'Verify that sensitive data is not stored in cleartext in local storage.'
OWASP_MASVS_L2: V2.2 MSTG-STORAGE-4: 'Verify that sensitive data is not stored in cleartext in external storage.'
V2.2 MSTG-STORAGE-5: 'Verify that sensitive data is not stored in cleartext in SQLite databases.'
